greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Primes of the form 9n^2-10n+3.
comment: For all entries p = 9*n^2-10*n+3 in the sequence, 9p-2 = (9n-5)^2 is a perfect square.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (MAGMA) [ a: n in [0..250] | IsPrime(a) where a is 9*n^2-10*n+3]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 16 2012
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 06 2009
